Docs.param: If true then this method is required to force changes to both the file's content and metadata to be written to storage; otherwise, it need only force content changes to be written

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock? Lock ();
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock Lock() cil managed
Public Function Lock () As FileLock
public: Java::Nio::Channels::FileLock ^ Lock();
member this.Lock : unit -> Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock

Docs.summary: Acquires an exclusive lock on this channel's file.
Docs.returns: A lock object representing the newly-acquired lock

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: the file channel is closed.
this channel was not opened for writing.
either a lock is already held that overlaps this lock request, or another thread is waiting to acquire a lock that will overlap with this request.
the calling thread was interrupted while waiting to acquire the lock.
the channel was closed while the calling thread was waiting to acquire the lock.
if another I/O error occurs while obtaining the requested lock.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock? Lock (long position, long size, bool shared);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock Lock(int64 position, int64 size, bool shared) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Lock (position As Long, size As Long, shared As Boolean) As FileLock
public: abstract Java::Nio::Channels::FileLock ^ Lock(long position, long size, bool shared);
abstract member Lock : int64 * int64 * bool -> Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock

Docs.param: The position at which the locked region is to start; must be non-negative
The size of the locked region; must be non-negative, and the sum position + size must be non-negative

true to request a shared lock, in which case this channel must be open for reading (and possibly writing); false to request an exclusive lock, in which case this channel must be open for writing (and possibly reading)
Docs.summary: Acquires a lock on the given region of this channel's file.
Docs.returns: A lock object representing the newly-acquired lock

format.a: Java documentation for java.nio.channels.FileChannel.lock(long, long, boolean).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if position or size is negative.
if this channel is closed.
if the requested region overlaps an existing lock or pending lock request.
if the channel is not opened in read-mode but shared is true.
if the channel is not opened in write mode but shared is false.
if this channel is closed by another thread while this method is executing.
if the thread is interrupted while in the state of waiting on the desired file lock.
if another I/O error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.MappedByteBuffer? Map (Java.Nio.Channels.FileChannel.MapMode? mode, long position, long size);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.MappedByteBuffer Map(class Java.Nio.Channels.FileChannel/MapMode mode, int64 position, int64 size) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Map (mode As FileChannel.MapMode, position As Long, size As Long) As MappedByteBuffer
public: abstract Java::Nio::MappedByteBuffer ^ Map(Java::Nio::Channels::FileChannel::MapMode ^ mode, long position, long size);
abstract member Map : Java.Nio.Channels.FileChannel.MapMode * int64 * int64 -> Java.Nio.MappedByteBuffer

Docs.param: One of the constants MapMode#READ_ONLY READ_ONLY, MapMode#READ_WRITE READ_WRITE, or MapMode#PRIVATE PRIVATE defined in the MapMode class, according to whether the file is to be mapped read-only, read/write, or privately (copy-on-write), respectively
The position within the file at which the mapped region is to start; must be non-negative
The size of the region to be mapped; must be non-negative and no greater than java.lang.Integer#MAX_VALUE
Docs.summary: Maps a region of this channel's file directly into memory.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the FileChannel is not opened for reading but the given mode is "READ_ONLY".
if the FileChannel is not opened for writing but the given mode is not "READ_ONLY".
if the given parameters of position and size are not correct. Both must be non negative. size also must not be bigger than max integer.
if any I/O error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock? TryLock ();
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock TryLock() cil managed
Public Function TryLock () As FileLock
public: Java::Nio::Channels::FileLock ^ TryLock();
member this.TryLock : unit -> Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock

Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire an exclusive lock on this channel's file.
Docs.returns: A lock object representing the newly-acquired lock, or null if the lock could not be acquired because another program holds an overlapping lock

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the file channel is closed.
if a lock already exists that overlaps this lock request or another thread is waiting to acquire a lock that will overlap with this request.
if any I/O error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock? TryLock (long position, long size, bool shared);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock TryLock(int64 position, int64 size, bool shared) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function TryLock (position As Long, size As Long, shared As Boolean) As FileLock
public: abstract Java::Nio::Channels::FileLock ^ TryLock(long position, long size, bool shared);
abstract member TryLock : int64 * int64 * bool -> Java.Nio.Channels.FileLock

Docs.param: The position at which the locked region is to start; must be non-negative
The size of the locked region; must be non-negative, and the sum position + size must be non-negative
true to request a shared lock, false to request an exclusive lock
Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire a lock on the given region of this channel's file.
Docs.returns: A lock object representing the newly-acquired lock, or null if the lock could not be acquired because another program holds an overlapping lock

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if any parameters are invalid.
if the file channel is closed.
if a lock is already held that overlaps this lock request or another thread is waiting to acquire a lock that will overlap with this request.
if any I/O error occurs.

Public MustOverride Function Write (src As ByteBuffer) As Integer
public: abstract int Write(Java::Nio::ByteBuffer ^ src);
abstract member Write : Java.Nio.ByteBuffer -> int

Docs.param: the byte buffer containing the bytes to be written.
Docs.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to this channel from the given buffer.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the channel was not opened for writing.
if the channel was already closed.
if another thread closes the channel during the write.
if another thread interrupts the calling thread while this operation is in progress. The interrupt state of the calling thread is set and the channel is closed.
if another I/O error occurs, details are in the message.

if this channel is closed.
